ygData.subject: Re: Random magic duration do you like it? wizard looser?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I d rate the wizard higher, if not because I play one :) Wizard isn t *that* good at low levels.  Still, my Monk friend is still amazed about the amount of
ygData.messageBody:
According to michael.andersen@...:
> play one. Personally I think the ranking is necromancer, enchanter,
> magician, and then wizard last.

I'd rate the wizard higher, if not because I play one :)

Wizard isn't *that* good at low levels. Still, my Monk friend is still
amazed about the amount of damage I dish, which is barely less than he
does. Counting fizzles.

The spells at real high levels are monstruous, and are simply combat-ending
(you cast only them once, because the monster will drop anything and go
straight at you; no one can dish out damage like that). The real forte
of the Wizard is, of course, travel spells. Druid can move around, but
the Wizard may bring his group with him.

(that's the real why I wanted to play a wizard in the end. Move around)

For solo, yes, wizard suck a little :)

--
